member.name: T:Cake.Tasks.Module.PluginLoaders.PluginLoader
member.summary: Encapsulates the logic to load Cake.Tasks plugins.

member.name: T:Cake.Tasks.Module.RegisteredTask
member.summary: A task registered from a plugin attribute.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Module.RegisteredTask.AttributeType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the plugin attribute.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Module.RegisteredTask.Method
member.summary: Gets or sets the method that contains the plugin logic.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Module.RegisteredTask.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the plugin. This is used to name the Cake task.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Module.RegisteredTask.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of the plugin. This is used to describe the Cake task.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Module.RegisteredTask.CiSystem
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the CI system under which this plugin can run. A null value indicates that the plugin will always run.
